content: The short answer to why we have money is money is because of Thomas Hobbes and his ilk. In the amazon, if you travel in to the jungle just a bit there is no money. We need money, but its value is ever changing. To value a silent moment, or happy people , helping people, smiling, trees …..and on and on we need mostly to enhance our sense of value. When the president of Argentina eats an empanada, its the best,made buy a high paid chef but the best empenada can be found anywhere in Argentina if you poke around. There is only one “best empannada” . The idea behind money is that someone decided that humans are evil and will alwayse take more than they need if things were free. I can only wear one pair of shoes at a time but i have three pairs for different conditions. They are as good as the one’sbill gates wears.. In Africa, it is recorded by anthropologists that once when a deal was made many generations ago whereby certain rocks represented a certain amount of goats, the boat capsized and the rock was lost. Since all parties present knew each other and could swear that the rock was lost, the seller agreed to accept the lost rock and it continued to be used as payment for maney generations , indeed, the annthropologist found itvstill in use. It was “ the rock that sank “. EVERYONE IN THE GREATER COMMUNITY ACCEEPTED THIS ABSTRACTION AS MONEY and continued to trade with it. So , what is money?.
